Text: Thanks for the upload, this one is kind of hard to find.

If there is anything else you have been looking for, let me know, I'll try to find it.  I mostly do the ones that are 80's and earlier (as you noticed) and are not already posted here. I only post on TPB.

It's appreciated, I'll be seeding for a while.


Here's an obscure request, would you happen to have the uncut version of 1900 with Robert DeNiro?
"The Legend of 1900" I assume.  Original Italian or English?
Actually, I found out it's already on here.  Thanks though.

You are welcome.  Sometimes it takes me a couple weeks to notice a torrent has less than 4 active seeders, take it off of stop and put it back on active.
Wow. great movie. Only those who have studied navigation will catch the joke of "Boxing the compass" that Matthau uses about what he and the woman do in bed.

Hi there madmax999

It seems like you have loads of movies available, or know where to find them,  I have been looking for 3 westerns for a long time, cant seem to neither buy nor download them, but maybe you can help? 

Guns of Honor
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0109960/

Trigger Fast
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0111492/

Tex and the Lord of the Deep
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0090150/

The last one need to be with either english or any scandinavian language subtitles on, as the movie is italian

I do know these are not that good movies, but I have read all the books in the two series, and would love to see the movies.

Viking
